titleStmt.title: James E. Hensley et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG12516

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Union Artillery, Navy and Marines Primary Source Documents ; Misc U.S.C.T. Primary Source Documents
msIdentifier.idno: Box 14, Folder BTRY C - 1st REGT LIGHT ARTILLERY 3nd BTRY HISTORY

body.p: His Excelency the Governor of Kentucky.

We the undersigned members of Company "C" 1st Ky,, Light Artillery Vol,, Having Served for the term of one year in the Service of the United States, under Captain Jno. W. Neville, and having re-enlisted for three year's more. do respectfully petition that Edwin W. Gould Sergt,, of the above named Company be Appointed Captain of the Company. By reason that the Captain's term of Service expires upon the tenth of Sept,, 1864. and we understand that he wishes to change his Position or retire from service.
Names. Rank. Names. Rank.
James.E. Hensley Sergt John, C, Mann corporal
